PA 212: Jangan Cemaskan Reuni, Rumput Saja Kita Jaga Apalagi Persatuan
05 Nov 2019, 06:15 by Indra Komara
Jakarta - Ketua Gerakan Pemuda (GP) Ansor Yaqut Cholil Qoumas mengimbau reuni PA 212 tak dijadikan ajang provokasi. Juru bicara PA 212, Novel Bamukmin, menegaskan agar tak perlu mengkhawatirkan agenda reuni tersebut.
"Alhamdulillah sudah tiap tahun kita buat dengan super damai, rumput saja kita jaga, apalagi persatuan, dan ini ajang membuktikan Islam dengan jutaan orang berkumpul, ranting saja tidak ada yang patah," kata Novel Bamukmin, kepada wartawan, Senin (4/11/2019).
Novel mengatakan tidak ada harus dicemaskan dari agenda reuni PA 212. Pihaknya, lanjut Novel, sudah menempatkan jajarannya untuk mencegah provokator di area reuni.
"Tidak ada yang perlu dikhawatirkan dan kita sudah siap menaruh orang di titik-titik tertentu untuk mencegahnya dari provokator yang setiap acara reuni selalu ada yang coba memprovokasi namun para laskar bisa mengatasi," jelasnya.
"Ini acara maulid dan munajat sehingga kami tidak mau dikotori oleh para provokator yang ingin mengadu domba anak bangsa," tutur Novel.

PA 212: Don't Worry about Reunions, Keep Your Law Even Let alone Unity
05 Nov 2019, 06:15 by Indra Komara
Jakarta - Chairperson of the Ansor Youth Movement (GP) Yaqut Cholil Qoumas appealed for the PA 212 reunion not to be a place for provocation. PA 212 spokesperson, Novel Bamukmin, stressed that there was no need to worry about the reunion agenda.
"Alhamdulillah, we have made it super peaceful every year, we only guard the grass, let alone unity, and this is a way to prove Islam with millions of people gathering, there are no broken branches," Novel Bamukmin said to reporters on Monday (4/11 / 2019).
Novel said there was no need to worry about the PA 212. reunion agenda, it said, Novel had put his staff in place to prevent provocateurs in the reunion area.
"There is nothing to worry about and we are ready to put people at certain points to prevent it from provocateurs who every time a reunion event is always trying to provoke but the paramilitary forces can overcome," he explained.
"This is a maulid and munajat event so we don't want to be polluted by provocateurs who want to pit the nation's children," Novel said.
